'''"Tea Harvest's Formula for Fragrance"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Tea Harvest's Formula for Fragrance" is obtainable from [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
